text: Married... with Children is an American sitcom. It aired for 11 seasons. It is about a family living in a fictional Chicago, Illinois, suburb. It stars Ed O'Neill, Katey Sagal, Amanda Bearse, Christina Applegate, David Faustino, Ted McGinley, and David Garrison. On April 22, 2012, Fox re-aired the series premiere in honor of its 25th anniversary. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 American television series debuts Category:1997 American television series endings Category:1980s American comedy television series Category:1990s American comedy television series Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:English-language television programs
title: Married... with Children
